languages.text: "Или же им претит мое присутствие". {n}Сохраняя учтиво-отчужденное выражение, Кассия коротко кивает.{/n} "В таком случае я тоже должна откланяться — проверить Санктум Навис после ритуала единения и подготовить палаты к предстоящему варп-прыжку. Благодарю за компанию, {name}".

traits.locale_text: "Или же им претит мое присутсвие". {n}Сохраняя учтиво-отчужденное выражение, Кассия коротко кивает.{/n} "В таком случае я тоже должна откланяться — проверить Санктум Навис после ритуала единения и подготовить палаты к предстоящему варп-прыжку. Благодарю за компанию, {name}".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Or because my presence offends them." {n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod.{/n} "Then I must take my leave as well. I am due to inspect the Sanctum Navis after the communion ritual and prepare the chamber for the upcoming warp jump. Thank you for your company, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Или же им претит мое присутствие". {n}Сохраняя учтиво-отчужденное выражение, Кассия коротко кивает.{/n} "В таком случае я тоже должна откланяться — проверить Санктум Навис после ритуала единения и подготовить палаты к предстоящему варп-прыжку. Благодарю за компанию, {name}".

I am due to inspect the Sanctum Navis after the communion ritual and prepare the chamber for the upcoming warp jump. Thank you for your company, {name}."

I am due to inspect the Sanctum Navis after the communion ritual and prepare the chamber for the upcoming warp jump. Thank you for your company, {name}."

I am due to inspect the Sanctum Navis after the communion ritual and prepare the chamber for the upcoming warp jump. Thank you for your company, {name}."

I am due to inspect the Sanctum Navis after the communion ritual and prepare the chamber for the upcoming warp jump. Thank you for your company, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Or because my presence offends them." {n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod.{/n} "Then I must take my leave as well. I am due to inspect the Sanctum Navis after the communion ritual and prepare the chamber for the upcoming warp jump. Thank you for your company, {name}."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Oder sie nehmen Anstoß an meiner Anwesenheit." {n}Cassia nickt dir mit höflich distanzierter Miene knapp zu.{/n} "Dann muss auch ich mich verabschieden. Ich muss nach dem Kommunionsritual das Sanctum Navis inspizieren und die Kammer für den bevorstehenden Warpsprung vorbereiten. Danke für Eure Gesellschaft, {name}."
languages.original_text: "Or because my presence offends them." {n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod.{/n} "Then I must take my leave as well. I am due to inspect the Sanctum Navis after the communion ritual and prepare the chamber for the upcoming warp jump. Thank you for your company, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Oder sie nehmen Anstoß an meiner Anwesenheit." {n}Cassia nickt dir mit höflich distanzierter Miene knapp zu.{/n} "Dann muss auch ich mich verabschieden. Ich muss nach dem Kommunionsritual das Sanctum Navis inspizieren und die Kammer für den bevorstehenden Warpsprung vorbereiten. Danke für Eure Gesellschaft, {name}."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « À moins que ma présence ne les offense. » {n}Avec un air distant et poli, Cassia hoche rapidement la tête.{/n} « Bien, je dois aussi prendre congé. Je dois inspecter le sanctum navis après le rituel de communion et préparer la chambre pour le prochain saut Warp. Merci pour votre compagnie, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "Or because my presence offends them." {n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod.{/n} "Then I must take my leave as well. I am due to inspect the Sanctum Navis after the communion ritual and prepare the chamber for the upcoming warp jump. Thank you for your company, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « À moins que ma présence ne les offense. » {n}Avec un air distant et poli, Cassia hoche rapidement la tête.{/n} « Bien, je dois aussi prendre congé. Je dois inspecter le sanctum navis après le rituel de communion et préparer la chambre pour le prochain saut Warp. Merci pour votre compagnie, {name}. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “又或许是我的到来碍了他们的眼。”{n}卡西娅冷淡而不失礼貌地点了点头。{/n}“那我也该告辞了。圣餐仪式结束后，我还要检查导航者圣所，为下次亚空间跃迁做好准备。感谢你的陪伴，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "Or because my presence offends them." {n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod.{/n} "Then I must take my leave as well. I am due to inspect the Sanctum Navis after the communion ritual and prepare the chamber for the upcoming warp jump. Thank you for your company, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “又或许是我的到来碍了他们的眼。”{n}卡西娅冷淡而不失礼貌地点了点头。{/n}“那我也该告辞了。圣餐仪式结束后，我还要检查导航者圣所，为下次亚空间跃迁做好准备。感谢你的陪伴，{name}。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「もしかしたら、あたくしの存在が感情を害しているのかもしれません」{n}礼儀正しいよそよそしさを顔に浮かべて、カシアは短く会釈する。{/n}「では、あたくしもお暇を告げなければなりません。聖餐の儀式の後に、サンクトゥム・ネイヴィスの査察をしなければならないのです。それから、部屋で来るべきワープジャンプの準備をしなければなりません。お付き合いいただきありがとうございます、{name}様」
languages.original_text: "Or because my presence offends them." {n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod.{/n} "Then I must take my leave as well. I am due to inspect the Sanctum Navis after the communion ritual and prepare the chamber for the upcoming warp jump. Thank you for your company, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「もしかしたら、あたくしの存在が感情を害しているのかもしれません」{n}礼儀正しいよそよそしさを顔に浮かべて、カシアは短く会釈する。{/n}「では、あたくしもお暇を告げなければなりません。聖餐の儀式の後に、サンクトゥム・ネイヴィスの査察をしなければならないのです。それから、部屋で来るべきワープジャンプの準備をしなければなりません。お付き合いいただきありがとうございます、{name}様」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «O porque mi presencia les ofende». {n}Con educación, Cassia inclina la cabeza de manera cortante.{/n} «Entonces yo también debo marcharme. Debo inspeccionar el Sanctum Navis tras el ritual de comunión y preparar la cámara para el próximo salto de disformidad. Le agradezco su compañía, {name}».
languages.original_text: "Or because my presence offends them." {n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod.{/n} "Then I must take my leave as well. I am due to inspect the Sanctum Navis after the communion ritual and prepare the chamber for the upcoming warp jump. Thank you for your company, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «O porque mi presencia les ofende». {n}Con educación, Cassia inclina la cabeza de manera cortante.{/n} «Entonces yo también debo marcharme. Debo inspeccionar el Sanctum Navis tras el ritual de comunión y preparar la cámara para el próximo salto disforme. Le agradezco su compañía, {name}».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Or because my presence offends them." {n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod.{/n} "Then I must take my leave as well. I am due to inspect the Sanctum Navis after the communion ritual and prepare the chamber for the upcoming warp jump. Thank you for your company, ."

languages.text: "Ya da varlığımdan rahatsız oldukları için." {n}Cassia, yüzünde nazik ancak bir o kadar da mesafeli bir ifadeyle başını kısaca sallıyor.{/n} "O hâlde ben de müsaadenizi isteyeyim. İştirak ayini sonrası Navis Kutağı'nı teftiş etmem, gelecek öte sıçrama için odayı hazırlamam gerekiyor. Eşlik ettiğin için teşekkürler {name}."
languages.original_text: "Or because my presence offends them." {n}With an expression of courteous aloofness on her face, Cassia offers you a curt nod.{/n} "Then I must take my leave as well. I am due to inspect the Sanctum Navis after the communion ritual and prepare the chamber for the upcoming warp jump. Thank you for your company, {name}."
